subject: fix(seed): version demo data so updates reach existing users
body:
Previously, seedIfEmpty() checked only a localStorage flag. Once set,
demo data in IndexedDB was never refreshed â€” users who visited before
a demoData.ts update kept seeing stale content.

Now seedService stores DEMO_DATA_VERSION alongside the seeded flag.
On version mismatch, stale demo entries (ID prefix "demo-") are removed
and current data is re-inserted in a single transaction. User-created
data is preserved.

Tags: seed, demo-data, versioning
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: demo-data
Semver: minor

title: version demo data so updates reach existing users
